mapper.select: SELECT SUM(A.SUPP_CONF_CNT) AS SUPP_CONF_CNT , SUM(A.PO_ISS_CNT) AS PO_ISS_CNT , SUM(A.PO_APPR_CNT) AS PO_APPR_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS SUPP_CONF_CNT, 0 AS PO_ISS_CNT, 0 AS PO_APPR_CNT FROM SCM0005M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0006D B ON (A.PLAN_ID = B.PLAN_ID) WHERE A.PLAN_YEAR = #{scmYearCbBox} AND A.PLAN_WEEK = #{scmWeekCbBox} AND A.PLAN_STUS_ID = 5 UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS SUPP_CONF_CNT, COUNT(*) AS PO_ISS_CNT, 0 AS PO_APPR_CNT FROM SCM0052M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0053D B ON (A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID) WHERE A.PO_YEAR = #{scmYearCbBox} AND A.PO_WEEK = #{scmWeekCbBox} UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS SUPP_CONF_CNT, 0 AS PO_ISS_CNT, COUNT(*) AS PO_APPR_CNT FROM SCM0052M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0053D B ON (A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID) WHERE A.PO_YEAR = #{scmYearCbBox} AND A.PO_WEEK = #{scmWeekCbBox} AND B.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID = 5 ) A

SELECT 'PDF ' || '/ EXCEL' AS PDF , DECODE(A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID, 1, 1, 5) AS CB_BOX_FLAG , B.PO_ID , B.PO_YEAR , B.PO_MONTH , B.PO_WEEK , B.CDC , A.PO_NO , A.PO_ITEM_NO , A.STOCK_CODE , C.STK_DESC AS NAME , C.STK_CTGRY_ID AS CTGRY_ID , D.CODE_NAME AS CTGRY , C.STK_TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID , E.CODE_NAME AS TYPE , NVL(A.PO_QTY, 0) AS PO_QTY , TO_CHAR(A.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PO_ISS_DT , B.PO_STUS_ID , G.NAME AS PO_STUS_NAME , A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID , F.NAME AS PO_ITEM_STUS_NAME , B.PLAN_GR_YEAR , B.PLAN_GR_MONTH , B.PLAN_GR_WEEK , NVL(A.PRC_UNIT, 0) AS PRC_UNIT , NVL(A.PURCH_PRC, 0) AS PURCH_PRC , NVL(A.FOB_PRC, 0) AS FOB_PRC , NVL(A.FOB_AMT, 0) AS FOB_AMT FROM SCM0053D A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0052M B ON (A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0026M C ON (A.STOCK_CODE = C.STK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M D ON (C.STK_CTGRY_ID = D.CODE_ID AND D.CODE_MASTER_ID = 11) /* 11 : Stock Category */ LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M E ON (C.STK_TYPE_ID = E.CODE_ID AND E.CODE_MASTER_ID = 15) /* 15 : Spare Part Type */ LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M F ON (A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID = F.STUS_CODE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M G ON (B.PO_STUS_ID = G.STUS_CODE_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_ID IN (SELECT Z.PO_ID FROM SCM0052M Z WHERE Z.PO_YEAR = #{scmYearCbBox} AND Z.PO_WEEK = #{scmWeekCbBox} AND Z.CDC = #{scmCdcCbBox}) ORDER BY A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO

SELECT A.PO_ID , A.PO_YEAR , A.PO_MONTH , A.PO_WEEK , A.CDC , A.PLAN_GR_YEAR , A.PLAN_GR_MONTH , A.PLAN_GR_WEEK , A.PO_STUS_ID , C.CODE_DESC AS CDC_DESC FROM SCM0052M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M C ON (A.CDC = C.CODE AND C.CODE_MASTER_ID = 349) /* 349 : Supply CDC Code */ WHERE A.PO_YEAR = #{poYear} AND A.PO_WEEK = #{poWeek} AND A.CDC = #{cdc}

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A.PO_NO) IS NULL THEN 'MY' || #{cdcDesc} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 'A' || '001' ELSE 'MY' || #{cdcDesc} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 'A' || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(A.PO_NO), 12, 3)) + 1, 3, '0') END AS PO_NO FROM SCM0053D A WHERE A.PO_NO LIKE 'MY' || #{cdcDesc} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 'A' || '%'
